name: Basic Prawn
tips: Can be exchanged for 19 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A shrimp with a large head and two claws. Delicious, tender, and juicy.

name: Good Prawn
tips: Can be exchanged for 25 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A freshwater prawn that can only be caught in a certain season. It tastes better than regular shrimp.

name: Great Prawn
tips: Can be exchanged for 28 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A giant prawn as big as your arm. It's a premium item at seafood restaurants.

name: Prime Prawn
tips: Can be exchanged for 30 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this freshwater prawn has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Best Prawn
tips: Can be exchanged for 36 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this freshwater prawn has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Basic Salmon
tips: Can be exchanged for 33 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A type of trout with delicious and plump meat. It's popular either fried or as sashimi.

name: Good Salmon
tips: Can be exchanged for 43 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A top-choice salmon. It has more fat, giving it a smooth texture that melts in your mouth.

name: Great Salmon
tips: Can be exchanged for 48 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: The finest salmon, only a small amount of which is caught each year. Its exquisite taste is unforgettable.

name: Prime Salmon
tips: Can be exchanged for 52 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this salmon has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Best Salmon
tips: Can be exchanged for 62 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this salmon has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Basic Star Snapper
tips: Can be exchanged for 22 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A popular edible fish. It has bright red scales.

name: Good Star Snapper
tips: Can be exchanged for 28 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A star snapper suitable for a high-end restaurant. It has a finer texture than a normal star snapper.

name: Great Star Snapper
tips: Can be exchanged for 32 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A rare star snapper over three feet in length. You could sell it to fish enthusiasts for a high price.

name: Prime Star Snapper
tips: Can be exchanged for 35 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this star snapper has a tag on it. It seems the fish shop has taken an interest in it.

name: Best Star Snapper
tips: Can be exchanged for 41 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this star snapper has a tag on it. It seems the fish shop has taken an interest in it.

name: Basic Crucian Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 28 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A common fish. It's nutritious but has a lot of bones, so you need to be careful when eating it.

name: Good Crucian Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 36 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: Thanks to the fine water quality, this fish is fatter and finer than ordinary crucian carp. It's extremely delicious.

name: Great Crucian Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 40 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: A special crucian carp raised with care. It's a rare specimen with fewer bones and more tender meat.

name: Prime Crucian Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 44 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this crucian carp has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Best Crucian Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 52 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.
contentBG: For some reason, this crucian carp has a tag on it. It seems the fish market has taken an interest in it.

name: Basic Black Carp
tips: Can be exchanged for 22 points at the Catch 'n' Trade.

name: Tonkatsu
tips: A dish made with flour, eggs, and pork.
contentBG: A dish featuring juicy pork covered with crispy batter. Pour some sauce over it and add as much rice as you want for the perfect bite.

name: Miso Ramen
tips: A dish made with flour, eggs, and miso.
contentBG: The rich miso soup pairs excellently with the springy egg noodles, creating an exquisite dish.

name: Salmon Sashimi
tips: A dish made with salmon, soy sauce, and wasabi.
contentBG: High-quality salmon sashimi, rich in sweet fat, and served with a simple pairing of wasabi and soy sauce.

name: Manju
tips: A dish made with glutinous rice, azuki beans, and sugar.
contentBG: A Japanese sweet made with rice flour and red bean paste. Using a flower-shaped wooden mold gives it a professional-level presentation.

name: Curry with Rice
tips: A dish made with rice, chicken, potatoes, onions, and curry roux.
contentBG: Classic curry and rice made by slowly simmering chunky ingredients.

name: Sukiyaki
tips: A dish made with beef, napa cabbage, tofu, shiitake mushrooms, and carrots.
contentBG: A flavorful hot pot with beef, vegetables, tofu, and mushrooms in a sweet and spicy sauce.

name: Matcha Ice Cream
tips: A dish made with matcha, milk, and sugar.
contentBG: Matcha-flavored ice cream that's easy to make at home. It has a simple yet rich flavor.

name: Croquette
tips: A dish made with flour, potatoes, and pork.
contentBG: Croquettes full of meaty umami flavor. The fluffy potatoes and crispy batter create a perfect combination.

name: Eel Rice Bowl
tips: A dish made with rice and eel.
contentBG: Thick, plump grilled eel served in a rich sauce over white rice. Almost too luxurious to eat at home.

name: Tricolored Dango
tips: A dish made with glutinous rice, milk, and sugar.
contentBG: Sweet and chewy rice dumplings in three appealing pastel colors.

name: Tempura
tips: A dish made with flour, eggs, shrimp, and soy sauce.
contentBG: Large shrimp tempura. The secret to frying them is to mix the batter with cold water and egg yolk.

name: Almond Jelly
tips: A dish made with almonds, milk, and sugar.
contentBG: With the right ingredients, authentic almond tofu is surprisingly easy to make.

name: Caramel Flan
tips: A dish made with milk, eggs, and sugar.
contentBG: A rich, traditional pudding that's simple yet surprisingly time-consuming to prepare. Perfect with a caramel sauce.

name: Omelette Rice
tips: A dish made with rice, eggs, and tomatoes.
contentBG: Classic omelette rice made with ketchup and rice wrapped with egg.

name: Seafood Salad
tips: A dish made with caviar, eggs, and cabbage.
contentBG: Fresh salad tossed with caviar and topped with a homemade egg dressing. Mom's own recipe.

name: Winter Melon Tea
tips: A dish made with winter melon and sugar.
contentBG: A simple blend of mashed winter melon and sugar, boiled down and mixed into water. It's said to be good for your health.

name: Mouthwatering Chicken
tips: A dish made with chicken, leek, garlic, and vinegar.
contentBG: A delicious Chinese dish made with tender steamed chicken in a spicy and sour sauce. Best served with rice.

name: Chinese Stir-Fry
tips: A dish made with sea cucumber, leek, and soy sauce.
contentBG: An authentic Chinese recipe that will test your culinary skills. Best of luck.

name: Sweet Kinako Mochi
tips: A dish made with glutinous rice and sugar.
contentBG: A Japanese sweet made with smooth, soft mochi drizzled with brown sugar syrup. It goes without saying that it's delicious.

name: Sweet and Sour Fish
tips: A dish made with sea bass, soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, and Shaoxing wine.
contentBG: Deep-fried white fish with a sweet and sour sauce. The secret ingredient is Shaoxing wine, adding a touch of authenticity.

name: Spicy Boiled Fish
tips: A dish made with sea bass, soy sauce, green onion, and chili pepper.
contentBG: Sichuan cuisine known for its intense spiciness. If you can take the heat, there's a definite umami note underneath it all.

name: Milk Pudding
tips: A dish made with milk, eggs, and sugar.
contentBG: A smooth and delicious milk pudding.

name: Gyoza
tips: A dish made with flour, shrimp, and pork.
contentBG: Handmade gyoza dumplings filled with shrimp. The juices overflow when you bite into the springy, fluffy wrapping.

name: Lychee Shrimp Balls
tips: A dish made with shrimp, lychees, and sugar.
contentBG: A regional stir-fry made with shrimp dumplings and lychee. It has a unique and fragrant aroma.

name: Sticky Rice Balls
tips: A dish made with glutinous rice, azuki beans, and sugar.
contentBG: Smooth and chewy rice balls filled with red bean paste. Try not to eat too many.

name: Cantonese Char Siu
tips: A dish made with pork, soy sauce, garlic, and sugar.
contentBG: Perfectly seasoned pork, slow-roasted in the oven for an easy and authentic char siu dish.

name: Beef Stew
tips: A dish made with beef, soy sauce, and chili pepper.
contentBG: A Chinese-style stew with tender beef and chili peppers. Even though it's spicy, you won't be able to stop eating it.

name: Spring Rolls
tips: A dish made with flour, pork, and cabbage.
contentBG: Handmade spring rolls, made with crispy batter and filled with rich flavors. Great when fresh, but you can also enjoy them cold.

name: Youlinji
tips: A dish made with chicken, leek, soy sauce, and sugar.
contentBG: Crispy fried chicken and chopped green onions in a sour sauce. Goes well with rice.

name: Mapo Tofu
tips: A dish made with tofu, beef, chili pepper, and soy sauce.
contentBG: A staple of Chinese cuisine. As long as you have the ingredients, it's surprisingly easy to make from scratch.

name: Shiruko
tips: A dish made with azuki beans and sugar.
contentBG: Eating this on a cold day will warm you right up. The gentle sweetness of the red beans gives it a nostalgic flavor.

name: Chinese Medicinal Soup
tips: A dish made with crucian carp, tofu, and leek.
contentBG: A creamy medicinal soup made with fried crucian carp. No strong odors, and nutrition you can taste. Classic Shanghai cuisine.

name: Shrimp Stir-Fry
tips: A dish made with shrimp, luxury Chinese tea, and eggs.
contentBG: A delicious and high-class dish made with shrimp and tea leaves. Iconic Hangzhou cuisine.

name: Mung Bean Milk
tips: A dish made with mung beans.
contentBG: Soy milk made with mung beans, rich in flavor.

name: Vinegar Tofu
tips: A dish made with tofu, garlic, and leek.
contentBG: A simple dish made by stir-frying thickly sliced deep-fried tofu with black vinegar. Quick to whip up, yet very delicious.

name: Grilled Rockfish
tips: A dish made with rockfish, pork, and soy sauce.
contentBG: A slightly elaborate dish of rockfish fried in lard. I wonder if it tastes better than grilled rockfish...

name: Stewed Chicken
tips: A dish made with chicken, soy sauce, leek, and garlic.
contentBG: Tender and juicy stewed chicken. The skin and tender meat practically melt in your mouth, making this one addictive delight.

name: Seared Beef
tips: A dish made with beef, soy sauce, and green onions.
contentBG: A delicacy of thinly sliced seared beef. Best enjoyed with a soy sauce-based dipping sauce.

name: Meat Pie
tips: A dish made with beef, pork, soy sauce, and garlic.
contentBG: A crispy and juicy dish made by baking pie dough stuffed with minced meat.

name: Refreshing Tonic
tips: A drink made with tonic water and mung beans.
contentBG: An espresso tonic suitable anyone can make with ease. The addition of soy milk to the recipe was apparently Shiina's idea.

name: Mellow Float
tips: A drink made with cream and luxury Chinese tea.
contentBG: A mocktail made with oolong and green tea, and topped with cream. Apparently, it was created by Shiina, and inspired by a cocktail called "shoyojurin."

name: Matcha Soda
tips: A drink made with soda water and matcha.
contentBG: A refreshing and simple drink made from matcha and soda water. There's a secret trick to making the matcha syrup.

tips: A drink made with tonic water and spice bundles.
contentBG: A two-ingredient soda made by steeping a spice pack in tonic water. Simple and refreshing.

tips: A drink made with assam tea and milk. Immediately restores 2 Action Points when used.
contentBG: A gourmet milk tea recipe from Shiina. One sip of this, and you'll never be satisfied with regular milk tea ever again.

tips: A tool usable in the Metaverse to open locked doors.

tips: Temporarily obstructs the enemy's vision.

tips: Slightly decreases a Palace's security level.

name: Covertizer
tips: Somewhat decreases a Palace's security level.

name: Incogniscent
tips: Greatly decreases a Palace's security level.

tips: Slightly decreases a Palace's security level.

name: The Chivalrous Jánošík
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG:
The story of the Slovakian phantom thief, Jánošík, who leads a band of thieves to fight against corrupt authorities.
Reading it might help you understand the charm of this heroic outlaw.

name: Scarlet Pride
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG:
The tale of the Scottish outlaw Rob Roy, living on the run as he seeks revenge against those who wronged him.
Reading it will help you understand the will to protect one's pride.

name: Queen of the Seas
tips: Increases your Guts when read.
contentBG:
The adventures of the beautiful female pirate, Awilda, who makes a name for herself as a pirate to escape a political marriage.
A book for the brave-hearted, who seek a life of freedom.

name: Smuggler on Horseback
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
The story of Mandrin, the French smuggler, and how he became a legendary thief who punished the wicked and shared his spoils with the good.
By studying this man who was both a merchant and a thief, you'll gain a wealth of knowledge.

name: The Kunoichi's Path
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
The story of Chiyome Mochizuki, a female shinobi, who could slip through even the tightest security with ease.
Just reading it might help this proficient ninjutsu practitioner's skills rub off on you.

name: Brigante Buono
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG:
The legend of the Italian gentleman thief, Ghino di Tacco.
Although he was a brigand, his gentlemanly charm earned the admiration of the people.

name: The Witch's Kiss
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
A story about a beloved apothecary who was suddenly accused of witchcraft and executed.
You may be able to learn from this woman's passion for gaining knowledge of medical science.

name: Rosina's Engagement
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG:
A story about a quiet, kindhearted schoolgirl who seeks true love while resisting the hands of fate.
For those seeking a heartwarming school romance story.

name: Forest on the Board
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
The protagonist of this story awakens to his hidden talent for chess, and soon becomes a world-famous champion.
Reading it should help you understand the fundamental strategy of the game as well.

name: Dance of Vengeance
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
A story about a princess exiled to an island by the queen. She spends her days practicing dance in the hope of one day getting her revenge at the ball.
The illustrations of the princess's elegant footwork may enhance your proficiency.

name: Grasping Victory
tips: Increases your Guts when read.
contentBG:
A story of a boy's baseball team chasing their dreams, repeatedly missing their shot at victory, but ultimately reaching the top through their efforts.
Reading about their enthusiastic determination may boost your courage.

name: Charisma 101
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG:
A book for those who want to acquire charisma.
With just this book, even you can become popular! Probably...

name: Suspect Y's Sacrifice
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG:
A story about a genius physicist who falls in love with a struggling single mother, and how he covers up her criminal deeds.
A novel that will move your heart.

name: Comprehensive Yoga
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
A book introducing various yoga exercises.
Mastering the highest-difficulty poses will surely improve your proficiency!

name: Apathy in the Modern Age
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
A book that examines the prevalence of a lack of desire among residents of developed countries.
For those who wish to deepen their understanding of social issues.

name: Mirika the Witch
tips: Increases your Guts when read.
contentBG:
A story about a high school girl who has been tormented by her classmates awakens to her powers as a witch and seeks revenge.
Just reading it seems to give you the courage to resist.

name: Weaving Fate
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG: A touching story about a boy who sends letters to his girlfriend after her tragic passing, and how those letters lead to a new bond.

name: What It Means to Fail
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
What are the true root causes of failure? The answers may surprise you!
Unlock the secrets of success and improve your knowledge with this book!

name: The Castle of Frost
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG: A story about a dancer who finds a castle sealed in ice, and meets a musician there. They discuss and come to understand the charms of their different arts.

name: By the Window
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG: A heartwarming school story where the new transfer student Kurumi-chan bonds with her kind teachers and classmates.

name: I Am a Dog
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
A story about a dog kept by a poor student that spends its days observing humans.
Reading it might help you understand the dog's proficient way of living.

name: Top-Secret Sakura Spots
tips: Increases your Kindness and unlocks Inokashira Park on the map when read.
contentBG:
Tourism guide for Inokashira Park.
Enjoy cherry blossom viewing with friends in the spring!

name: All About Skytree
tips: Increases your Guts and unlocks Asakusa Skytree on the map when read.
contentBG:
A book that introduces the untold stories of the construction of the Skytree and other architectural tidbits.
With this one book, you'll never have to worry about running out of topics on a date!

name: The World of Art
tips: Increases your Charm and unlocks Ueno Art Museum on the map when read.
contentBG: A guidebook introducing the history and permanent exhibitions of museums in Ueno.

name: Science Savvy: Stars
tips: Increases your Knowledge and unlocks Ikebukuro Planetarium on the map when read.
contentBG:
A book introducing the planetarium in Ikebukuro.
You can learn more details about the constellations projected there.

name: Secret Librarian Skills
tips: Increases your Knowledge and raises your part-time job salary at the Shinjuku Hinokuniya Bookstore when read.
contentBG:
Never get lost in a bookstore again!
By mastering the techniques of a librarian, you'll be able to find the books you're looking for right away!

name: Delectable Desserts!
tips: Increases your Charm and raises your part-time job salary at the Shibuya crêpe shop when read.
contentBG:
For those who want to create satisfying desserts.
A recipe book covering everything from crêpes to giant cakes.

name: The Language of Flowers
tips: Increases your Kindness and raises your part-time job salary at the Shibuya flower shop when read.
contentBG: A book that explains the meanings of flowers and their origins in an easy-to-understand manner with accompanying photos.

name: Choosing the Right Gift
tips: Increases your Kindness and raises your part-time job salary at the Shinjuku accessory shop when read.
contentBG:
A book that explains how to choose gifts that will make the recipient happy.
For those who want to become a master of gift giving.

name: The Ingredient Whisperer
tips: Increases your Knowledge and raises your part-time job salary at Zoshigaya's Heritage Kitchen when read.
contentBG:
An advanced book for leveling up your cooking skills.
For those who want to be able to judge the quality of ingredients at a glance.

name: Analysis of Film
tips: Increases your Knowledge and enhances your movie-watching rewards when read.
contentBG:
Introducing a unique way to watch movies explained by a professional film critic.
With this book, you can learn to enjoy the finer points of film!

name: Quick Relaxation Methods
tips: Increases your Charm and enhances your bathhouse rewards when read.
contentBG:
A book that introduces effective ways to take breaks and relax.
Even better to read in the bath.

name: MUSCLES!
tips: Increases your Proficiency and enhances your training rewards when read.
contentBG:
A book introducing the basics of muscle training.
Its key feature is the easy-to-read content suitable for beginners.

name: Encapsulated Mysteries
tips: Increases your Charm and boosts the appearance rate of rare capsules.
contentBG: A booklet featuring trivia about capsule vending machines and their unique items.

name: All About First Aid
tips: Increases your Kindness and raises your part-time job salary at the Shibuya drugstore.
contentBG:
A handbook explaining various first aid methods.
It provides many in-depth explanations, from disinfecting wounds to chest compressions.

name: Fast Food Finesse
tips: Increases your Kindness and raises your part-time job salary at the Shibuya beef bowl restaurant.
contentBG: A guidebook on handy tips for working part-time at fast food restaurants, and specific service methods that receive high praise from customers.

name: Convenience Store Clout
tips: Increases your Proficiency and raises your part-time job salary at the Shibuya convenience store.
contentBG: A guidebook on handy tips for working part-time at convenience stores, and specific service methods that receive high praise from customers.

name: The Art of Kabuki
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG:
A book that delves into the history and technical development of kabuki.
Reading it might help you absorb some of the refined charm of the stage.

name: Keiun Chronicles
tips: Increases your Kindness when read.
contentBG:
A tale of a nobleman from a thousand years ago who came to the aid of women in distress.
It will surely deepen your compassion and kindness.

name: Cyber Ninjutsu Scrolls
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
A story about a scientist who uses technology to become a "Modern Ninja."
There's something to be learned from his proficiency in making gadgets and hidden weapons.

name: Starvation of the Mind
tips: Increases your Knowledge when read.
contentBG:
This book observes the condition of people in modern society, who despite privileges like food security
in the midst of rapid economic development, are experiencing various other hardships.

name: Legend of the Ronin
tips: Increases your Guts when read.
contentBG:
The story of a betrayed samurai who falls from grace, but rises up from the bottom again.
His unwavering determination will surely inspire courage.

name: Menswear Monthly
tips: Increases your Charm when read.
contentBG:
A men's fashion magazine featuring popular celebrities and actors in photo spreads.
This special issue comes with a stylish eco-bag!

name: Featherman: A Corpus
tips: Increases your Guts when read.
contentBG:
A magazine that provides an in-depth explanation of the popular action drama series "Phoenix Ranger Featherman."
It covers everything from the earliest films to its latest releases!

name: Devil School Summoners
tips: Increases your Proficiency when read.
contentBG:
A survival story about a group of high school students who are suddenly transported to a hell dimension along with their school building.
It might help you learn how to survive in another world too...

name: Premium+ Special
tips:
The following items can be obtained after purchasing a Premium+ Phantom Pass:
• Exclusive Outfit: <link="fashion|309069"><u>Beige Knit Outfit<color=#0F69CA></color></u></link>
• Exclusive Profile Card: <link="display|306949"><u>Fairy Tale<color=#0F69CA></color></u></link>
• Exclusive Frame: <link="display|306878"><u>Consideration<color=#0F69CA></color></u></link>

• Plus, Spray-On Dye x1 as a bonus.
New outfit colors will also unlock after you obtain your exclusive outfit and go to the in-game closet on the second floor of your home.
These colors include <link="fashion|309070"><u><color=#00fcff>Light Blue Knit Outfit</color></u></link>, <link="fashion|309071"><u><color=#ff9c00>Green Knit Outfit</color></u></link>, and <link="fashion|309072"><u><color=#00ff9f>Aqua Knit Outfit</color></u></link>.

name: Phantom Thief Gift
tips:
Phantom Pass items up for grabs:
1 Salamander Coin
5 Gold Tickets
2 Everlasting Incense
6 Coffee Aids
as well as training materials and Konpaku Gems.

Premium Pass items up for grabs:
4 Salamander Coins
2 Limited 4★ Weapon Cases
3 Platinum Tickets
3 Platinum Milicoins
1 Orange Fortune Revelation
3 Everlasting Incense
6 Coffee Aids
as well as training materials and Konpaku Gems.

name: Knowledge
tips: Your ability to know, think, and understand. Can be increased by attending class, studying, and other activities.

name: Guts
tips: Your ability to not flinch or be afraid. Can be increased by going to the gym, reading, and other activities.

name: Proficiency
tips: Your ability to get things done efficiently. Can be increased by playing games, using the workbench, and other activities.

name: Kindness
tips: Your ability to be considerate to others. Can be increased by cleaning, caring for plants, and other activities.

name: Charm
tips: Your ability to fascinate and attract others. Can be increased by going to the bathhouse, cooking, and other activities.

name: Social Stats
tips: Knowledge, Guts, Proficiency, Kindness, and Charm are the 5 social stats.

name: Chihaya Mifune's Fortune-Telling
tips: Gain a variety of bonuses based on your fortune.

name: Ryuji Sakamoto
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Physical, Assassin
Persona: Captain Kidd

A second-year high school student. Due to his rough behavior, he's branded as a problem child by those around him. In truth, he's a compassionate and courageous guy who's prepared to take action.
His code name is Skull.

name: Morgana
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Wind, Medic
Persona: Zorro

A mysterious catlike creature that can communicate with humans. Though he may speak harshly, he will always devotedly help his fellow Phantom Thieves.
His code name is Mona.

name: Motoha Arai
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Electric, Sweeper
Persona: Awilda

A second-year high school student and classmate of Wonder. Cheerful, caring and gifted at sports, she is very popular around campus.
Her code name is Closer.

name: Tropical Motoha
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Electric, Sweeper
Persona: Awilda

A second-year high school student and classmate of Wonder. Having overcome her past, she can freely enjoy the summer of youth.
Her code name is Closer.

name: Lufel
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Fire, Medic
Persona: Robroy

A mysterious visitor from the Metaverse that bears the resemblance of an owl. He is a wealth of information when it comes to the Metaverse, though he lacks any memories associated to it.
His code name is Cattle.

name: Riko Tanemura
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Support, Elucidator
Persona: Chiyome

A third-year high school student, and chair of the Disciplinary Committee. With her strong sense of morals, she is a distinguished member of the school.
Her code name is Wind.

name: Riko Tanemura
tips: AAAAAA==

name: Shun Kano
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Ice, Guardian
Persona: Mandrin

A second-year high school student. Quiet and socially awkward, he does not have many friends his age. He is devoted to becoming a chef.
His code name is Soy.

name: Leo Kamiyama
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Nuclear, Strategist
Persona Duo: Erytheia

A 19-year-old who had a childhood obsession with the action series "Phoenix Ranger Featherman" and dreams of becoming a stuntman.
His code name is Leon.

name: Kayo Tomiyama
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Support, Elucidator
Persona Duo: Cleodora

A cheery 44-year-old housewife who used to be a famous fashion designer.
Her code name is Okyann.

name: Yaoling Li
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Curse, Saboteur
Persona Duo: Meng Po

A first-year university student studying abroad from China. She has an easy-going and friendly personality, though she can be a bit childish sometimes.
Her code name is Rin.

name: Tomoko Noge
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Psychokinesis, Strategist
Persona Duo: Prosymna

A second-year high school student, with an easy-going personality and an observant eye. Formerly a baseball catcher.
Her code name is Moko.

name: Seaside Tomoko
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Psychokinesis, Strategist
Persona Duo: Prosymna

A second-year high school student with an easy-going personality. This summer, she's working at a beach house to help revive its business.
Her code name is Moko.

name: Yui
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Electric, Assassin
Persona Duo: Apseudes

An online player met in a virtual world. Cheerful and friendly, she has a somewhat refined manner of speech.
Her code name is Bui.

name: Kiyoshi Kurotani
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Fire, Saboteur
Persona Duo: Syke

A first-year high school student and self-proclaimed Chosen One, he is fully absorbed in a world of fantasy.
His code name is Key.

name: Yukimi Fujikawa
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Bless, Guardian
Persona Duo: Styx

A second-year high school student, raised by her cruel and oppressive mother. Though she does not agree with her mother's beliefs, she still wants to live up to her expectations.
Her code name is Yuki.

name: Seiji Shiratori
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Wind, Assassin
Persona Duo: Leucothea

A second-year high school student, and member of the fencing club. Though polite and well-mannered, his behavior comes off as somewhat cold.
Her code name is Fleuret.

name: Goro Akechi
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Almighty, Strategist
Persona: Robin Hood

A third-year high school student. His sharp mind, affable nature, and striking looks make him the center of attention.
His code name is Crow.

name: Yusuke Kitagawa
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Ice, Sweeper
Persona: Goemon

A second-year high school student. Though his looks turn heads, his quirky personality tends to alienate people.
His code name is Fox.

name: Futaba Sakura
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Support, Elucidator
Persona: Necronomicon

A girl one year below Ren Amamiya. When it comes to mathematics and programming, she's a genius, but her communication skills are severely lacking.
Her code name is Oracle.

name: Toshiya Sumi
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Curse, Assassin
Persona Duo: Gorgyra

Known as the Fish Whisperer. He is a kind and charitable soul, but holds little regard for himself.
His code name is Sepia.

name: Ann Takamaki
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Fire, Sweeper
Persona: Carmen

A second-year high school student. Her striking features cause her to stand out, leaving her ostracized by those around her.
Her code name is Panther.

name: Makoto Niijima
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Nuclear, Assassin
Persona: Johanna

A third-year high school student. With her sharp mind and strong moral compass, she is calm, responsible and prepared to take action, though she is also known to be strict and have a stubborn side to her.
Her code name is Queen.

name: Kotone Montagne
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Ice, Assassin
Persona Duo: Terpsichore

A young girl who is half-French. Once a world-class athlete, she longs for the world of ice.
Her code name is Mont.

name: Yumi Shiina
tips:
<color=#eade10>★★★★★</color>
Main Attribute/Role: Support, Elucidator
Persona Duo: Urania

A 26-year-old woman who works at a bar in Shibuya. She incorporates her dance background in her bartending, making her very popular with customers.

A college student and musician. Though she is shy and introverted, when her band split, she refused to give up on her dream, and decided to take up street performing.
Her code name is Chord.
